General.Name: NaturalShrimp Inc
General.Description: NaturalShrimp Incorporated operates as an aquaculture technology company in the United States and internationally. It develops a technology to produce fresh and gourmet-grade Pacific white shrimp. NaturalShrimp Incorporated was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
General.Address: 5501 LBJ Freeway, Dallas, TX, United States, 75240
